abstract: KaloBios Pharmaceuticals says two directors have resigned after arrest of chief executive Martin Shkreli on securities fraud charges.
lead_paragraph: KaloBios Pharmaceuticals said that two directors had resigned after the arrest of Martin Shkreli, who had been its chief executive, on securities fraud charges this month.

headline.main: Two Directors Tied to Shkreli Resign From KaloBios Board
headline.print_headline: Two Directors Tied to Shkreli Resign From Kalobios Board

snippet: KaloBios Pharmaceuticals said that two directors had resigned after the arrest of Martin Shkreli, who had been its chief executive, on securities fraud charges this month.
